full_sentence: It can be seen that Jewish Bankers Fund the Money to Remove Non-Jewish Monarchs. See "Communist Revolution" and ROTHSCHILDS...

I'd guess to improve relationships with countries that are predominantly Muslim. All of this, of course, is terrifying, I can only guess.
